title: #306: The Hunt for a Serial Killer, Rapist, Paedophile, Burglar - Part 9
description:
We finish our coverage of the serial perpetrator RR. We discuss his last known victims Bill Cairns and Inex Erickson. Jim and Laura analyze RR’s background. Lisa asks Jim a delicate question.
